data.name: Dead Estate Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack, composed by MajorWipeout, for the game Dead Estate.

NOTE: some track titles contain spoilers. Proceed with caution.
Also because it's spooky down there! I think I saw a ghost?
Both are good reasons to proceed with at least some semblance of caution.

1. Dead Estate 01:09
2. Here We Go (Again) 02:50
3. Sex Sells 01:36
4. Combative Dissonance 02:46
5. RUN! 00:35
6. Rising Tension 02:44
7. Deadline 00:41
8. Getting Experimental 03:29
9. Bigger and Better 01:32
10. Steady Yourself 00:54
11. And Then There's Chunks 01:09
12. The End? 01:43
13. Dead Estate (Chapter 2) 01:36
14. A Warning From Beyond 02:46
15. Dead Estate (Chapter 3) 01:36
16. Sneaking Out 03:29
17. Pharaoh's Tomb 04:05
18. Lights, Camera, 03:03
19. ACTION 00:53
20. Sunken Dreams 03:50
21. One-Way 3X1T 02:15
22. Diavola's Cage 02:12
23. Diavola's Rage 02:01
24. A Grand Escape 00:37
25. Safe and Sound 01:38
26. Dead Estate (True Ending) 01:36
27. Dead Estate (100% Completion) 1:36
